<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/clients/{clientId}/sp/sites/{siteId}/lists/{listId}/items/{itemId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This function deletes a specific item from a SharePoint list using the provided list ID and item
ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"- The `itemId` parameter is of type `number` and represents the unique\nidentifier of the item that you want to delete from a SharePoint list.","in":"path","name":"itemId","required":true,"schema":{"format":"double","type":"number"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
